definitions.definition: a person whose job is to shape or design something:
examples: the latest exciting new car designed by our team of stylists

definitions.definition: a person whose job is to help people, especially famous people, decide on a style of clothes, hair, etc.:
examples: She needs to fire her stylist - that outfit is awful!

definitions.definition: a writer who has a good writing style and chooses the words they use very carefully:
examples: She's no stylist, but she writes very exciting stories.
